code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{list,deleteItem}from'./counterSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Counter(){const[val,setval]=useState({name:''});const pd={padding:'2px',backgroundColor:'#ccc',borderRadius:'10px',cursor:'pointer'};const count=useSelector(state=>state.counter.val);const dispatch=useDispatch();const handler=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setval(oldval=>{return{...oldval,[name]:value};});};const btn=()=>{dispatch(list(val.name));};const dltcl=id=>{dispatch(deleteItem(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",onChange:handler}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:btn,children:"btn"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ol",{children:count.map((val,ind)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{margin:'10px'},children:[val," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:pd,onClick:()=>dltcl(ind),children:"Dlt"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:pd,children:"Edt"})]})});})})})]});}
